IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE LIZZADRO MUSEUM OF LAPIDARY ARTS PRIMARY EXEMPT PURPOSE IS TO OPERATE A MUSEUM OF ART FOR THE COLLECTIONS CARE STUDY AND EXHIBITION OF PRECIOUS AND NON-PRECIOUS GEMS CERAMICS AND OTHER OBJECTS OF ART AND THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC THERETO.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE LIZZADRO MUSEUM OF LAPIDARY ARTS PRIMARY EXEMPT PURPOSE IS TO OPERATE A MUSEUM OF ART FOR THE COLLECTIONS CARE STUDY AND EXHIBITION OF PRECIOUS AND NON-PRECIOUS GEMS CERAMICS AND OTHER OBJECTS OF ART AND THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC THERETO.
IRS990.Desc: LAPIDARY COLLECTION EXPENSE - THE PROMOTION OF THE LAPIDARY ART THROUGH SPECIAL PROGRAMS ON THE HISTORY AND MAKE UP OF THE MUSEUM. OVER 22,100 CHILDREN AND ADULTS VISITED THE MUSEUM THIS YEAR ON SITE OR THROUGH VIRTUAL PROGRAMMING. EVERY WEDNESDAY IS FREE ADMISSION. THE MUSEUM COLLABORATES WITH COMMUNITY ORGANIZATIONS TO PROVIDE CULTURAL AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS FOR THE PUBLIC. ALSO THE MUSEUM DISPLAYED 1 TEMPORARY SPECIAL EXHIBIT: "RE-CARVING THE PAST: THE ART OF CHINESE BRONZES AND JADES" - DISPLAYED FROM THE REOPENING ON NOVEMBER 12 2019 THROUGH 2020. THIS COLLABORATIVE EXHIBIT WITH THE MACLEAN COLLECTION FROM METTAWA IL JUXTAPOSES 11 LOANED ARCHAIC BRONZES WITH SIMILIAR JADES FROM THE LIZZADRO COLLECTION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE MUSEUM STAFF OPERATES A GIFT SHOP AT THE MUSEUM'S FACILITY WHICH AFFORDS VISITORS THE OPPORTUNITY TO PURCHASE BOOKS LITERATURE AND LAPIDARY REPLICAS. THE GIFT SHOP'S INVENTORY OF LAPIDARY SPECIMENS CONSISTS PRIMARILY OF LOW PRICED ITEMS WHICH ARE REPRESENTATIVE FACSIMILIES OF THE LAPIDARY AND RELATED ART OBJECTS DISPLAYED AT THE MUSEUM. THE PRIMARY PURPOSE OF THE GIFT SHOP FACILITY IS CONSISTENT WITH THE UNDERLYING EXEMPT PURPOSE OF THE MUSEUM AND THUS IS CHARACTERIZED AS RELATED BUSINESS INCOME FOR PURPOSES OF THE MUSEUM'S REPORTING REQUIREMENTS SEE SECTION 513 OF INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1954 AS AMENDED AND THE REGULATIONS PROMULATED THEREUNDER.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: TOURS AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS - THE MUSEUM HELD 16 ON-SITE WEEKEND PROGRAMS AND 13 LIVE VIRTUAL PROGRAMS. LIVE VIRTUAL PROGRAMS WERE RECORDED AND POSTED TO YOUTUBE AND OUR WEBSITE GENERATING ADDITIONAL VIEWS ALONG WITH OUR CURATORS CORNER AND GEOLOGY ROCKS BLOG. ALL VIRTUAL PROGRAMS WERE FREE TO THE PUBLIC WITH THE EXCEPTION OF KIT-BASED PROGRAMS. THE MUSEUM EDUCATOR AND CURATOR HAD TO DRAMATICALLY PIVOT TO PRODUCE AND PRESENT PROGRAMS VIRTUALLY. NEW HARDWARE AND SOFTWARE WAS NECESSARY TO PROVIDE THE VIRTUAL PROGRAMS. A NEW TICKETING PLATFORM WAS ALSO USED TO ALLOW ONLINE REGISTRATION FOR PROGRAMS AND LIMITED CAPACITY ON-SITE VISITORS. OUR EFFORTS WERE SUCCESSFUL FOR ENGAGING NEW AUDIENCES HOWEVER GENERATING LITTLE REVENUE

OtherSecuritiesGrp.Desc: STOCK - CROWDSTRIKE HLDGS INC CL A

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRINCIPAL PURPOSE OF THE LIZZADRO MUSEUM OF LAPIDARY ART MUSEUM IS THE PUBLIC DISPLAY AND DISSEMINATION OF INFORMATION REGARDING THE FILED OF LAPIDARY ARTS. THE MUSEUM'S ART COLLECTION CONSISTS OF GEMSTONES DIORAMA'S JADE CARVINGS AND VARIOUS ROCKS MINERALS AND FOSSJILS.
JOHN S. LIZZADRO SR. JOSEPH F. LIZZADRO JOHN S. LIZZADRO JR. LOUIS L. LIZZADRO JOHN NICHOLAS GINA NICHOLAS AND DOROTHY ASHER HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP.
THE ORGANIZATION MAKE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: In 2021 the exempt status was revoked. We got the help from an IRS Taxpayer Advocate - Michelle McCarthy. We provided all the returns with proof of timely filing because of this the Museum was unable to file the return electronically. The return was mailed and also faxed to Michelle McCarthy the taxpayer Advocate. When filing the 2022 return electronically and calling the IRS and speaking with Agent John Reilly #1000144786 he made the Museum aware that the 2020 return was returned for the Museum to file electronically. The Museum did file the return on time and ask that no penalties be assessed.
